Until <S%G891><s%> The <S%G3739><s%> Day In Which, <S%G2250><s%> Having Given Command <S%G1781><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Chose, <S%G1586><s%> He Was Taken Up : <S%G353><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Yours <S%G5216><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Seasons <S%G2540><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Placed <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> His <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G2398><s%> Authority; <S%G1849><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> They Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Of Olives, <S%G1638><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> A Sabbath's <S%G4521><s%> Being Distant <S%G2192><s%> Journey. <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> They Had Entered <S%G1525><s%> They Went Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Upper Chamber, <S%G5253><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Staying <S%G2650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> Bartholomew <S%G918><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Matthew <S%G3156><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> Son Of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Zealot, <S%G2207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jude <S%G2455><s%> Brother Of James. <S%G2385><s%>

This Man <S%G3778><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Got <S%G2932><s%> A Field <S%G5564><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Headlong <S%G4248><s%> Having Fallen <S%G1096><s%> Burst <S%G2997><s%> In The Midst <S%G3319><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gushed Out <S%G1632><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bowels. <S%G4698><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Known <S%G1110><s%> It Became <S%G1096><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Dwelling <S%G2730><s%> In Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Was Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G5564><s%> Field <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G2398><s%> Own Language <S%G1258><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> , Aceldama; <S%G184><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> Field <S%G5564><s%> Of Blood. <S%G129><s%>

It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> Of Psalms, <S%G5568><s%> Let Become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Homestead <S%G1886><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Desolate, <S%G2048><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let There <S%G3361><s%> Not Be One <S%G2077><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Dwelling <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Overseership <S%G1984><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Let Take <S%G2983><s%> Another. <S%G2087><s%>

It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Consorting <S%G4905><s%> With Us <S%G2254><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> All The <S%G3956><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Came In <S%G1525><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> ' Among <S%G1909><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Set Forth <S%G2476><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Barsabas, <S%G923><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Justus, <S%G2459><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Matthias. <S%G3159><s%>

To Receive <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Part <S%G2819><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1248><s%> Of This Service <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Apostleship, <S%G651><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Transgressing Fell <S%G3845><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> His <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Own. <S%G2398><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Gave <S%G1325><s%> Lots <S%G2819><s%> , Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lot <S%G2819><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> , Matthias, <S%G3159><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Numbered <S%G4785><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eleven <S%G1733><s%> Apostles. <S%G652><s%>
